resources.string: Phone
Tournament Start In
The winning from VIP tables become redeemable only after you convert VIP chips back to real cash chips
The VIP tables end on the last day of the Quarter. On this day, all the balance VIP chips will be converted back to real cash chips automatically.
Tax Deduction: In case the VIP chip winnings are more than 10,000, tax shall be deducted when VIP chips are converted back to real cash chips.
Players can register with 30 real chips
Starting stack 1000, blind increaments time 6 mins and turn time 15 seconds
Late registration allowed for 25 mins
No rebuys allowed.
Players will be automatically seated on random tables.
Table will merge automatically and winners will continue to play.
Prize: 3 tickets for main event step 2.
You have insufficient chip balance in your Poker wallet. Please transfer your VIP chips to Poker wallet to enable above option(s).
You have insufficient chip balance in your Poker wallet. Please transfer your VIP chips to Poker wallet to Rebuy.
You have insufficient chip balance in your Poker wallet. Please transfer your VIP chips to Poker wallet to Addon.
